original: Ekelund, Carl Emanuel, häradskrivare, Visby, f. 5/8/97 i Visby, Gotl. l., av stadskamrer Chr. E. o. Jenny Ericsson. G. 30 m. Greta Carlsson. Barn: Gunnar f. 36, Elisabeth 37, Gunilla 40. — Stud. v. Visby h. a. 1. samt v. Schartaus hand:inst. 18-20. Tf. kronokassör 30, ord. ;sed. 34, häradsskrivare 46.
translated: Ekelund, Carl Emanuel, district clerk, Visby, b. 5/8/97 in Visby, Gotland, son of city treasurer Chr. E. and Jenny Ericsson. Married in 1930 to Greta Carlsson. Children: Gunnar b. 1936, Elisabeth b. 1937, Gunilla b. 1940. — Studied at Visby high school and Schartaus Handelsinstitut 1918-1920. Acting Kronokassör from 1930, permanent from 1934, district clerk from 1946.
